Posts.Content: hi joan,      i to had the same as u but no tamoxifen, i really do believe that anyone who has cancer is very brave, and yes we all want to live, i finished all my treatment june this year, i have my own tiny hair salon with my daughter, only had it for 2 yrs, i feel very bitter the only time i  had off was 3days in 12 months of my treatment if i didnt work my rent on the business and the rent on our flat wouldnt get payed, couldnt get any help whats so ever from anyone, in all the 35yrs of working paying all my taxes, i couldnt get a penny from our wonderful goverment!!!!!!!!!! sorry to say all that but it just makes me so cross coz i have my salonand i wprk for myself        take care
